resources.string: Forgot your password? Do not worry! Please enter your email address below!
We will send you a reset password link and you could simply click it to change your password!
1) You can simply tap on the floating button on bottom right of the screen to add a new task.
2) You can enter your task and description in task and description fields.
3) Then you can either save your task or cancel your task.
4) If you want, you could later edit or delete your task! This will help you manage your time well.
5) You can start this simply by clicking on the button below. This button will redirect you to your to do lists.
How to use To do list.
1) Once you click on the planning button below, it will direct you to a calendar.
2) On this calendar, you can choose the date you want to add an event.
3) You can click on the arrow keys to switch between months. Once you have chosen the date, you can click on weekly button in top center which takes you to weekly calendar.
4) This weekly calendar can be used similarly to switch between weeks. You can click on new event button which takes you to a new page where you can add an event.
5) Once you have named your event, you can simply choose time and click save.
